value_id.title: Gene Identifier
value_id.description: The official gene identifier as designated by the organism gene nomenclature committee e.g. HGNC:3477 or MGI:2385071.

symbol.title: Gene Symbol
symbol.description: The primary gene symbol. Takes the place of the label field in a generic descriptor.

description.description: A free-text description of this gene context.

items.description: Alternate IDs (should be CURIE) for the same gene context.
Alternate symbols (should be CURIE) for the same gene context.
Related concept IDs (e.g. gene ortholog IDs) may be placed in xrefs.
